title: Bug 112458: Property Editor shows layout item properties instead of Master Page properties in Master page viewer
description:
Description: When switching to the Master page viewer, the Property Editor still displays the properties of layout items instead of reflecting the Master Page properties.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Property Editor.
2. Switch to the Master page viewer.

OB: This can confuse customers, as they may mistakenly believe they are in the Master Page Editor and set properties without first clicking on the Master Page viewer.

EB: When switching to the Master Page, the Property Editor should change to reflect the Master Page properties.

SR: The Property Editor should only display the properties of the Master Page when in the Master page viewer.
